police-hq.title: Metropolitan Police HQ
police-hq.content: A bustling hub of law enforcement in the heart of the city. The glass and steel building houses the latest in forensic technology.
police-hq.lore: A bustling hub of law enforcement in the heart of the city. The glass and steel building houses the latest in forensic technology.

sarah-miller.title: Detective Sarah Miller
sarah-miller.content:
A sharp-witted detective known for her unconventional methods and high solve rate. She doesn't sleep until the case is closed.

She is currently working on [[The Diamond Heist]].
sarah-miller.lore:
A sharp-witted detective known for her unconventional methods and high solve rate. She doesn't sleep until the case is closed.

She is currently working on [[The Diamond Heist]].

agent-cooper.title: Agent Cooper
agent-cooper.content: A former intelligence officer who now works as a high-priced consultant. He provides Miller with technical intel that 'doesn't exist'.
agent-cooper.lore: A former intelligence officer who now works as a high-priced consultant. He provides Miller with technical intel that 'doesn't exist'.

the-syndicate.title: The Syndicate
the-syndicate.content: A global crime syndicate involved in high-end theft and money laundering. They are the target of Miller's investigation.
the-syndicate.lore: A global crime syndicate involved in high-end theft and money laundering. They are the target of Miller's investigation.

attack-doberman.title: Trained Doberman
attack-doberman.content: A highly trained police dog used for tracking and apprehension. It is loyal, fast, and extremely effective.
attack-doberman.lore: A highly trained police dog used for tracking and apprehension. It is loyal, fast, and extremely effective.

diamond-case-file.title: Case File: The Star of the East
diamond-case-file.content: A thick folder containing crime scene photos, fingerprint analysis, and suspect lists related to the museum heist.
diamond-case-file.lore: A thick folder containing crime scene photos, fingerprint analysis, and suspect lists related to the museum heist.

the-diamond-heist.title: The Diamond Heist
the-diamond-heist.content: A sophisticated robbery at the National Museum where the 'Star of the East' diamond was stolen without a single alarm being triggered.
the-diamond-heist.lore: A sophisticated robbery at the National Museum where the 'Star of the East' diamond was stolen without a single alarm being triggered.
